pipes.heading: SAFER
pipes.subHeading: HDPE pipe transfers natural gas, water, corrosive chemicals and slurries without leaks or contamination.
pipes.description: We’re out to make leakage, waste and contamination a thing of the past. SECOR can optimize your municipal, civil or commercial project with a forward-thinking engineered solution that will save resources over its lifespan. That is what makes HDPE piping from SECOR the efficient, smart choice.

pipes.heading: STRONGER
pipes.subHeading: Pressure rated and tested. Lasting performance. Made in the U.S.A.
pipes.description: Traditional steel, cast iron and PVC piping can not compare to the longevity, durability and quality HDPE piping and fittings from SECOR. With accurate pressure ratings and fusion-bonded joints, we have the solution for today’s projects. Five locations across America means we’re here to serve with a deep and comprehensive inventory of products.
